title: Reloading and Weapons SFX
longDescription:
This pack contains 235 weapon sounds.

Listen


Carbine 32 Sounds:

  • BulletCarbine-3
  • CarbineShot 10 (5 noreverb and 5 reverb)
  • CarbineSilencer Shot 10 (5 noreverb and 5 reverb)
  • Shutter 3
  • ShutterShort 3
  • TriggerHook 3


Pistol 38 Sounds:

  • BulletPistol 3
  • GetHolder 2
  • Holder 1
  • InsertHolder 2
  • PistolShot 10 (5 noreverb and 5 reverb)
  • ShortInsertHolder 2
  • Shutter 4
  • Silencer 2
  • SilencerShot 10 (5 noreverb and 5 reverb)
  • TriggerHook 2


Revolver 32 Sounds:

  • BulletRevolver 3
  • CloseRevolver 3
  • OpenRevolver 3
  • PullTheTrigger 5
  • Revolver Shot 10 (5 noreverb and 5 reverb)
  • TriggerHook 3
  • Turn 5


Rifle 41 Sounds:

  • BulletRifle -3
  • Insert 2
  • InsertShort 2
  • PullOut 2
  • RifleShot 10 (5 noreverb and 5 reverb)
  • RifleShutter 4
  • RifleShutter1Short 4
  • Silencer 2
  • Silencer Rifle Shot 10 (5 noreverb and 5 reverb)
  • TriggerHook 2


Shotgun 22 Sounds:

  • Bullet 3
  • Shotgun Shot 10 (5 noreverb and 5 reverb)
  • Shutter Shotgun 3
  • Shutter Shotgun1 Short 3
  • TriggerHook 3


Source 70 Sounds:

  • CarbineShot 10
  • PistolShot 10
  • RevolverShot 10
  • RifleShot 10
  • ShotgunShot 10
  • SilencerPistolShot 10
  • SilencerRifleShot 10
technicalDetails:
Technical Details
